mapper.insert:
SELECT gen_random_uuid()
insert into daily_timesheets (id, employee_id, date, first_check_in, last_check_out, working_hours, status, shift_id, created_at, updated_at) values (#{id,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{employeeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{date,jdbcType=DATE}, #{firstCheckIn,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastCheckOut,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{workingHours,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shiftId,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update daily_timesheets set employee_id = #{employeeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, date = #{date,jdbcType=DATE}, first_check_in = #{firstCheckIn,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_check_out = #{lastCheckOut,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, working_hours = #{workingHours,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shift_id = #{shiftId,jdbcType=OTHER}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=OTHER}
mapper.select: select 'false' as QUERYID,id, employee_id, date, first_check_in, last_check_out, working_hours, status, shift_id, created_at, updated_at from daily_timesheets where id = #{id,jdbcType=OTHER}
select id, employee_id, date, first_check_in, last_check_out, working_hours, status, shift_id, created_at, updated_at from daily_timesheets
